about_the_game:
You are a simple sailor caught in a storm on your first voyage. The ship hits the reefs, it's entire crew dies, and only you are left, beached on an uninhabited island. Do you have any choice but to try and survive? To choose between life and death? Find out in the card visual novel Choice of Life: Wild Islands!

Conquer the jungle and prove that even in the most desperate situation you are the master of your fate!

It's up to you to be a hard worker, or a hedonist who takes what he wants from nature. Do you want to build a civilization in the middle of a wild forest, alone, or have fun with facing your death?
You decide how to explore the island. Save your supplies or waste them without thinking. Defeat the beasts of the forests in a bloody battle, or try to tame them to live together in harmony?
It's up to you! Leave this island, or make it your new home?

But be careful - every choice you make could cost you your life, and not just yours...

Key Features:
  • A non-linear plot, where every choice can have unpredictable consequences
  • Vivid 2D illustrations that make your life on the island colorful and unique
  • A thousand events and a bottle of rum! More specifically, a hundred ways to die...
